price: Naslonjeni na divane, oni u njemu ni Sunce ni veliku hladnoću neće osjetiti,
arabic: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِۖ لَا يَرَوۡنَ فِيهَا شَمۡسٗا وَلَا زَمۡهَرِيرٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: muttakiīna fīhā ʿalā al-arāiki lā yarawna fīhā shamsan walā zamharīran
